title: What is AngularJS?

metadata.description: Learn about What is AngularJS? with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
AngularJS lets you extend HTML with HTML attributes called directives AngularJS directives offers functionality to HTML applications AngularJS provides built-in directives and user defined directives AngularJS Directives AngularJS uses double braces {{ }} as place holders for data. AngularJS directives are HTML attributes with the prefix ng- The ng-app directive initializes an AngularJS application. The ng-init directive initializes application data. Example

{{ message }}

The ng-model Directive The ng-model directive binds the value of HTML elements to application data. Example

Name:

You wrote: {{firstName}}

The ng-bind Directive The ng-bind directive binds data to a model. Example

Name:

You wrote

Full AngularJS Tutorial This has been a short description of AngularJS. For a full AngularJS tutorial go to AngularJS Tutorial . For a full AngularJS reference go to AngularJS Reference . ★ +1

summary: This tutorial covers What is AngularJS? concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use What is AngularJS? effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of What is AngularJS? and how to apply it in your projects.
